TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Vbc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

summary.span: 實作 Vbc 工作。

span.span: Implements the Vbc task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 Vbc 元素，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the Vbc element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [Vbc 工作](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [Vbc Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 將可進入回應檔的參數 (Switch) 和其他資訊填入指定的 參數 (Parameter)。

span.span: Fills the specified parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool CallHostObjectToExecute() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CallHostObjectToExecute () As Boolean

summary.span: 透過主物件來編譯專案。

span.span: Compiles the project through the host object.

returns.span: 如果編譯成功，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if compilation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機物件傳遞給，會取得在執行期間呼叫這個方法`Vbc`工作。This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the `Vbc` task.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisabledWarnings { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定一個或多個由警告識別項的數字部分所指定要隱藏的警告。

span.span: Gets or sets one or more warnings to suppress that are specified by the numeric part of the warning identifier.

value.span: 由警告識別項的數字部分所指定要隱藏的警告。

span.span: The warnings to suppress that are specified by the numeric part of the warning identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若有多個警告，則會以分號分隔。Multiple warnings are separated by semicolons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentationFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 開啟文件註解處理，以及取得或設定輸出文件 XML 檔案。

span.span: Turns on documentation comments processing and gets or sets the output documentation XML file.

value.span: 輸出文件 XML 檔案。

span.span: The output documentation XML file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會覆寫屬性。This property overrides the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，這個字串值指定工作如何報告內部編譯器錯誤。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

value.span: 指定工作如何報告內部編譯器錯誤的字串值。

span.span: A string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以具有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `prompt` - `send` - `none` 如果`prompt`指定發生編譯器內部錯誤，則會提示使用者選擇是否要將錯誤資料傳送給 Microsoft。If `prompt` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the user is prompted with an option of whether to send the error data to Microsoft. 如果指定 `send` 且發生編譯器內部錯誤時，工作會將錯誤資料傳送給 Microsoft。If `send` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the task sends the error data to Microsoft. 預設值為 `none`，僅報告文字輸出中的錯誤。The default value is `none`, which reports errors in text output only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Execute() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Execute () As Boolean

summary.span: 覆寫 Execute，這樣我們就可以在編譯器完成之後移動 PDB 檔案 (如果需要)。

span.span: Override Execute so that we can move the PDB file, if we need to, after the compiler is done.
Returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GenerateDocumentation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，該值指定是否將文件註解處理成 XML 檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to process documentation comments to an XML file.

value.span: 如果Vbc工作會處理文件註解的 XML 檔案; 否則。

span.span: if the Vbc task processes documentation comments to a XML file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸出 XML 檔的名稱是可執行檔或工作所建立的文件庫的名稱。The name of the output XML file is the name of the executable file or the library that the task is creating.

The full file path of the tool.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.HostObjectInitializationStatus InitializeHostObject() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function InitializeHostObject () As HostObjectInitializationStatus

summary.span: 傳回主物件初始設定狀態值，這個值表示下一個動作應該是什麼。

span.span: Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

returns.span: 表示下一個動作應該是什麼的主物件初始設定狀態值。

span.span: A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機物件傳遞給，會取得這項工作執行期間呼叫這個方法`Vbc`工作。This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the `Vbc` task.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LangVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定語言版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the language version.

value.span: 傳回語言版本。

span.span: Returns the language version.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LogEventsFromTextOutput(string singleLine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance) cil managed
protected: override void LogEventsFromTextOutput(System::String ^ singleLine, Microsoft::Build::Framework::MessageImportance messageImportance);

param.name: singleLine
param.span: 擷取自 vbc 編譯器之 STDOUT 的單一行

span.span: A single line captured from the STDOUT of the vbc compiler

param.name: messageImportance
param.span: 訊息重要性：高、低或普通

span.span: The message importance: High,Low, or Normal

summary.span: 這個方法會攔截來自 VBC 的 STDOUT 且要記錄的文字輸出行。

span.span: This method intercepts the lines to be logged coming from STDOUT from VBC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦我們看到標準 vb 警告或錯誤，我們擷取它，然後抓取接下來的 3 行，因此我們可以將轉換的字串形式的 FileName.vb(line,column)，讓我們 ide 報告的行和資料行的 FileName.vb(line) 表單並因此篩選在重複的情況下，多目標的錯誤，或只波浪線適當的權杖，而不是整行。Once we see a standard vb warning or error, then we capture it and grab the next 3 lines so we can transform the string form the form of FileName.vb(line) to FileName.vb(line,column) which will allow us to report the line and column to the IDE, and thus filter the error in the duplicate case for multi-targeting, or just squiggle the appropriate token instead of the entire line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ModuleAssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定此模組所屬的組件 (Assembly) 名稱。

span.span: The name of the assembly that this module will be a part of.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值指定編譯器是否不應該參考標準程式庫。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the compiler should not reference the standard libraries.

value.span: 如果編譯器不應該參考標準程式庫，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the compiler should not reference the standard libraries; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoVBRuntimeReference { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個値指定編譯器是否應該在不使用 Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫參考的情況下進行編譯。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the compiler should compile without a reference to the Visual Basic Runtime Library.

value.span: 如果編譯器應該在不使用 Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫參考的情況下進行編譯，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the compiler should compile without a reference to the Visual Basic Runtime Library; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoWarnings { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值指定工作是否將抑制所有警告。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task will suppress all warnings.

value.span: 如果工作會隱藏所有警告則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the task will suppress all warnings; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OptionCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，這個值指定如何進行字串比較。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

value.span: 字串值，這個值指定如何進行字串比較。

span.span: A string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以具有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `binary` - `text` 值 `binary` 指定此工作使用二進位字串比較。The value `binary` specifies that the task uses binary string comparisons. 值 `text` 指定此工作使用文字字串比較。The value `text` specifies that the task uses text string comparisons. 預設值是 `binary`。The default value is `binary`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OptionExplicit { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指定是否需要明確宣告變數。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether explicit declaration of variables is required.

value.span: 如果需要明確宣告變數則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if explicit declaration of variables is required; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OptionInfer { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值指定是否要在變數宣告中使用區域型別推斷。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to use local type inference in variable declarations.

value.span: 如果Vbc工作將變數宣告; 中使用區域類型推斷否則。

span.span: if the Vbc task will use local type inference in variable declarations; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OptionStrict { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指定工作是否強制執行嚴格的類型語意來限制隱含類型轉換。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task enforces strict type semantics to restrict implicit type conversions.

value.span: 如果工作會強制執行嚴格型別語意則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the task enforces strict type semantics; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OptionStrictType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value for the property.

summary.span: 目前，此值可以設為 "custom"，指定工作是否會產生隱含縮小類型轉換的警告。

span.span: Currently, the value can be set to "custom" and specifies whether the task generates warnings for implicit narrowing type conversions.

value.span: 屬性的值。

span.span: A value for the property.
